sense.gloss: seasonal change of clothing, changing one's dress for the season
renovation, facelift, redesign, redecoration, new appearance, fresh look

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑更衣↑↓|ころもがえ|↓↑室↑↓しつ↓で↑財布↑↓さいふ↓を↑盗↑↓ぬす↓まれた。
sdata.e: I had my purse stolen in the changing room.

sdata.j: そろそろ↑衣替↑↓|ころもが↓え|しなくちゃ。
sdata.e: I need to start changing my outfit for the new season.
